Articles.Content:
Hi, all kerbonauts of questionable intelligence! I wish to know if there are any other games like BARIS (Buzz Aldrin\'s Race Into Space), because I am getting slightly bored with just going to the moon with only one set of rockets, people, and spacecraft. If there are any I ask you to please post them here.

Best regards,

technoguy33.

I am going to kick right off the bat and say no. Many have tryed in open source projects to remake BARIS with a longer time period, more rockets, ect. But I have heard of non getting to a playable stage.
But it would be a good mod for KSP. I mean, it was my first thought when I have seen KSP: yeah, good platform for a BARIS-mod. Just with chance to control rockets.
